report.title: Surprised to Feel So Good
report.author: Murple
report.bodytext: A close friend of mine is getting ready to leave for a 6 month trip to Bolivia. This being his last weekend here, we decided to throw a party for /n him. He and another friend had both expressed some interest in trying /n methylone after I had discussed it with them, and this seemed like the /n perfect opportunity. Although I'd done it the past weekend, I decided to /n join them, so I measured out three doses of 150mg each and brought them to /n the party. I had considered bringing higher doses, but I figured it would /n be better to start them low and see how they respond. The setting of the /n party was at a friends house, with at most 20 people present, a DJ playing /n music, party decorations, snacks, etc. A typical social gathering. /n /n At around 9 PM, I told my two friends that I'd brought the /n methylone and asked if they were still interested. They mentioned some /n mixed feelings, worried that this would be another 'shitty internet drug' /n that would leave them feeling poisoned (as some tryptamines and 2C-T-7 /n had), but they decided to give it a shot after I reassured them this /n wasn't another pukefest trip. We all dosed together at around 9:15. The /n first friend is a male, age 22. I don't know his weight, but he's kind of /n large. The second friend is female, also 22, weighing probably around 110 /n pounds. Both are very experienced psychedelics users, having used LSD, /n psilocybin, MDMA, mescaline, DPT, 5-MeO-DMT, DMT (ayahuasca), 5-MeO-DIPT, /n 2C-T-7, and perhaps a few others. While both like psychedelics in general, /n the nausea of ayahuasca and 2C-T-7 and the hideous experience of snorting /n DPT has left them somewhat skeptical about many of the currently available /n analogues. I can certainly understand this position. /n /n At around 9:45, we all began to feel initial effects. The girl said 'I /n feel good 'several times, sounding almost surprised. The guy said it felt /n like the initial phase of a psychedelic. By 10 PM, we were all more or /n less at peak effects. They both described the effects as being similar to /n the initial phase of MDMA, but toned down and subtly different. We went /n for a short walk outside under the full Purim moon, which was brightly /n illuminating the large yard. It was pretty cold, but this didn't seem to /n bother anyone. /n /n Socializing was definately enhanced, but there was none of the /n emotional outpouring of MDMA. It was a nice friendly evening. All of us /n felt that it was a very relaxed and happy state of mind. By around 11:30, /n we were all coming down. Smoking some cannabis seemed to diminish most of /n the remaining effects, though it seemed to enhance some aspects. By 12:30 /n AM, the guy was feeling a little tired and decided to go home. I stayed /n until around 2 AM before I felt comfortable driving home. /n /n Both my friends expressed a willingness to do it again, but at a /n higher dose. /n /n Personally, I found no noticable difference between this 150mg /n experience and the 120mg experience of the past weekend (less than a week /n elapsed - Sunday afternoon to Friday night). I wonder if tolerance played /n a role? Probably. Were it not for the fact that my friend was going to /n Bolivia, I would not have taken it again so soon. I think taking this drug /n more than once a month would be a waste... not to mention an unnecessary /n risk, considering the highly experimental nature of this chemical. Taking /n this drug in a social setting was much more rewarding than taking it by /n myself - the exact opposite of MDMA. I would like to try it in a situation /n such as a nature hike with 2 or 3 friends... I suspect that would be the /n optimal use for this material.
